changes.title: Define SnowFlow Direction Constraint
changes.reason: Baseline requires two-stage snow removal with fixed flow direction front→mid→up and chute aligned to that flow.
changes.impact: Locks mechanical architecture for intake/discharge interfaces.
changes.notes: Prevents design drift towards drifting/outboard chutes.

changes.title: Chassis Frame Gusseting Upgrade (Rev A→B)
changes.reason: Field vibration test showed stress concentration near drivetrain mounts.
changes.notes: Updates coating process spec for new weld zones.

changes.title: No-Mast Sensor Integration Rule
changes.reason: Baseline prohibits mast/pole/rod for sensors and lights.
changes.impact: Enforces low-profile integrated sensor armor housing.
changes.notes: All future CAD must comply; violations are design failures.

changes.title: LiDAR Window Heating Strategy (Rev A→B)
changes.reason: Snow/ice accumulation reduced LiDAR reliability in wet snow tests.
changes.impact: Improves perception stability; increases power draw slightly.
changes.notes: Update sensor power budget and wiring harness label.

changes.title: Sacrificial Wear Parts Mandatory (Cutting Edge + Skid Shoes)
changes.reason: Baseline requires ground-contact components to be bolt-on replaceable metal wear parts.
changes.impact: Creates consumable SKUs and service kits; improves maintainability.
changes.notes: Drives spare parts planning and supplier kitting.

changes.title: Impeller Housing Clearance Increase (Rev A→B)
changes.reason: Slush accumulation and clogging observed under heavy wet snow.
changes.impact: Reduces clogging risk; requires updated weldment drawing.
changes.notes: Keep balance spec unchanged; only housing geometry changed.

changes.title: Rear-Facing Vertical Wireless Charging Requirement
changes.reason: Baseline charging design aims to avoid snow burial and support unattended operation.
changes.impact: Locks charging subsystem to rear vertical dock alignment.
changes.notes: Dock must remain operable during storms; alignment tolerance is critical.

changes.title: Wireless Receiver Alignment Tolerance Update (Rev A→B)
changes.reason: Docking tests showed misalignment due to packed snow at rear bumper.
changes.impact: Improves docking success rate; minor mechanical change.
changes.notes: Update bumper guide spec and test checklist.

changes.title: Industrial Safety Lighting Baseline
changes.reason: Baseline defines safety lighting configuration (beacon + work + amber + side markers), no decorative lighting.
changes.impact: Locks lighting set and mounting constraints (low profile).
changes.notes: All lamps must be sealed, shock-rated, and integrated into armor.

changes.title: Main Compute Thermal Headroom (Rev A→B)
changes.reason: Thermal margin insufficient when running perception workloads continuously.
changes.impact: Increases reliability; may change enclosure interface.
changes.notes: Monitor obsolescence risk; keep alternate qualification ongoing.

changes.title: Unmanned-Only Visual Language Lock
changes.reason: Baseline forbids cockpit/seat/steering/handlebars or any human-scale cabin volume.
changes.impact: Guides industrial robot form factor; affects industrial design and enclosure geometry.
